tool_description: testing environment for creating shipping labels using different carriers, calculating shipping prices, manifesting, carrier pickup, eVS & ePostage certified.
title: International Bridge Blue Sandbox

api_list.name: Delete Pickup
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://international-bridge-blue-sandbox.p.rapidapi.comhttps://api-sandbox.myibservices.com/v1/pickups/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "international-bridge-blue-sandbox.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

}
